name: Save The Village!
description:
DISCLAIMER: This game was designed for play only on a computer! If you do run it on your mobiles, it will throw errors!

Player has to take decisions to try and save their village from evil villager and his monster and retrieve stolen treasure.

Please be patient while the game loads for the first time!

If you can't see the full screen button after pressing play, zoom out from your browser settings or scroll to the right bottom corner and it should be there. It is clickable only after the game has loaded.

If you have any requests or questions, please let me know down in the comments or send me an email at: raneemwael99@gmail.com
